overwatch.db

Class Personnel

  • java.lang.Object
    • overwatch.db.Personnel

  • public class Personnel
extends java.lang.Object
    Get/set various aspects of personnel information from the database.
    Version:
    3
    Author:
    Lee Coakley

        public static boolean delete(java.lang.Integer personNo)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isInSquadOrVehicle

        public static boolean isInSquadOrVehicle(java.lang.Integer personNo)
        Checks if the person is used in any of the other tables. If so, deleting them will cause major problems.
        Returns:
